Html:
Hi all,

        is there a way to reset the app to it's default settings or to make it forget about a certificate that was linked to it. I found that changing the location of the app will do that but is it possible to do it without chaging the location of the app.

Thanks a lot!

Luc

Hi guys,

            Well, still wondering if SMTP4DEV creates a config file that it keeps somewhere esle than whwre it is installed and if yes, would it be possible to create a pre-configured version so that someone whi installs it on their PC do not have to play with the settings.

 

Thanks again!

 

Luc
